question: Would you rather your crush see your 2AM selfie album or your 2012 Facebook posts?
Would you rather date someone who moans while eating or yells ‘yummy’ after every bite?
Would you rather fart every time you laugh or snort every time you kiss?
Would you rather be ghosted by your crush or accidentally send them a poop emoji every day for a week?
Would you rather your hair smell like tuna or your breath smell like onions — permanently?
Would you rather only wear neon clothes or only speak in rhymes for a month?
Would you rather date a guy who only talks in TikTok sounds or one who calls his mom for every decision?
Would you rather always say ‘I love you’ after sneezing or bark when nervous?
Would you rather have eyebrows that change color with mood or laugh like a goat forever?
Would you rather live with 3 messy frat boys or 1 perfect guy who uses baby voice daily?
Would you rather have to compliment every ex you meet or hug every dude named Chad?
Would you rather wear clown makeup on every date or only speak in riddles to your crush?
Would you rather burp butterflies or hiccup rainbows?
Would you rather post your worst drunk text or your worst selfie to your story forever?
Would you rather be able to hear your crush’s thoughts or have them hear all of yours?
